title: "Artificial intelligence to determine which music broadcast on TV is subject to copyright"
excerpt: "The music of television productions is a major source of revenue for the music industry thanks to copyright. Copyright can only be exercised when the music is sufficiently audible, but this is difficult to determine depending on the context."
